issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are not closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description: Found in vectorization enable by default experiment.
fields.summary: Vectorization: Turning on vectorization in escape_crlf produces wrong results

comments.body:
[~mmccline] 

I debugged this issue and the issue is caused by a problem in copyToBuffer of LazySimpleDeserializeRead. The local variable i to index the source buffer is used in a confusing way. The fix will be simple. If you don't mind, I can do the fix work and upload the patch.
Yes, thank you, I'd appreciate that.
Patch is ready. Please help review.
Just found there are a few incorrect indents. Will make a change and submit again.
Fixed the spaces and indents. Please help review.  Thanks.

ATTACHMENT ID: 12920411 - PreCommit-HIVE-Build

Resubmit the patch with the following fixes:
 # Fixed one bug in the code. The check of (k < bufferLength -1) is not needed.
 # Fix the check style errors.
 # Improve the unit test with the boundary cases.
+1 LGTM tests pending.  [~jerrychenhf] I'm you researched this issue and created a fix!  Thank you!
(Consider petitioning [~vgarg] to see if this should go into branch-3)

Hive QA is not triggered with last patch submitted. Just resubmit the patch based upon Matt's suggestion.
